about_the_game:
The Edition upgrades to Ghosts of Tabor will grant you a starter kit to get you going in the first sessions, including a base selection of weapons, currency, and other consumables that make your first extraction a more likely success, though, remember, trust no one.

Items in the Edition Upgrades also persist through progression wipes that periodically will reset progress.

*** Starter Edition upgrades do not stack ***

Join or Die Edition Upgrade grants you:




Additional Bunker Access
  • Intel room

Additional Starting Equipment:
  • 100,000 Koruna
  • Enough gunpowder and shells to make 50 rounds of ammo
  • Food Items (2 pcs.)
  • Water Bottles (2 pcs.)
  • Nerds Healing Injectors (2 pcs.)
  • Tier 1 Knifes (2 pcs.)
  • Tier 2 Armor (1 pcs.)
  • Tier 3 Armor (1 pcs.)
  • Backpack (2 pcs.)
  • Glock and PM (1 pcs. each)
  • Glock and PM Magazines (2 pcs. each)
  • M4 and AK-Alpha (1 pcs. each)
  • M4 and AK-Alpha Magazines (2 pcs. each)
  • Frag Grenades (2 pcs.)
  • Optic and Rail Attachment for AK (1 pcs. each)

ALL ITEMS ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE. The Join or Die upgrade automatically includes the Care Package Edition, but Editions does not stack.

Items in the Edition Upgrades also persist through progression wipes that periodically will reset progress.

name: Ghosts of Tabor - Join or Die Edition Upgrade

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Ghosts of Tabor - Join or Die Edition Upgrade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i5 6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: OpenXR. Standing or Room Scale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i7 7700k or Higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1080GTX or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers

short_description: This Upgrade replaces the items you receive from the Standard Edition of the game.
